SELECT a.EDU_NO, (SELECT CATEGORY3_NAME FROM EDU_CLASS_CATEGORY3 WHERE CATEGORY3_KEY = a.CATEGORY3_KEY AND CATEGORY2_KEY = a.CATEGORY2_KEY AND CATEGORY1_KEY = a.CATEGORY1_KEY) AS CATEGORY3_NAME, a.COPER_NM_AUTO, a.EDU_TARGET, a.EDU_TIME, a.EDU_GARDEN, IFNULL((SELECT SCHEDULE_NO FROM (SELECT SCHEDULE_NO, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY SCHEDULE_NO DESC) AS SEQ FROM EDU_SCHEDULE WHERE 1=1 AND REG_ID = #{UserAccount.user_id}) a WHERE a.SEQ = 1),a.EDU_STATUS) AS EDU_STATUS FROM EDU_REGISTRATION a WHERE EDU_SITE = #{site} AND CATEGORY1_KEY = #{category1_key} AND CATEGORY2_KEY = #{category2_key} AND EXP_USE_YN = 'Y'
AND COPER_NM_AUTO LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchText}, '%')
AND CATEGORY3_KEY IN (SELECT CATEGORY3_KEY FROM EDU_CLASS_CATEGORY3 WHERE CATEGORY3_NAME LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchText}, '%'))
ORDER BY EDU_NO DESC LIMIT #{recordCountPerPage} OFFSET #{offset}

SELECT a.INSTRUCTOR_IDX, (SELECT CD_NM FROM COM_CD_MNG WHERE UP_CD_NO = '32' AND CD = b.RGN_CD) AS AREA_NM, FN_DECRYPT(b.ENCPT_USER_NM) AS USER_NM, b.USER_ID, b.INST_NM AS COPER_NM FROM EDU_INSTRUCTOR a, COM_USER b WHERE 1=1 AND a.COM_USER_ID = b.USER_ID AND a.STATUS = 1 AND a.USE_YN = 'Y' AND a.COM_USER_ID IN (SELECT f.USER_ID FROM COM_USER_EDU_INFO f, (SELECT (SELECT CD_NO FROM EDU_CLASS_CATEGORY3 WHERE CATEGORY3_KEY = d.CATEGORY3_KEY AND CATEGORY2_KEY = d.CATEGORY2_KEY AND CATEGORY1_KEY = d.CATEGORY1_KEY) AS CD FROM EDU_REGISTRATION d WHERE d.EDU_NO = ${edu_no}) g WHERE f.EDU_INFO_CD = g.CD)
AND b.RGN_CD = ${area_nm}
AND FN_DECRYPT(b.ENCPT_USER_NM) LIKE CONCAT('%', #{ins_nm}, '%')
AND b.INST_NM LIKE CONCAT('%', #{coper_nm}, '%')
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM EDU_SCHEDULE a, EDU_SCHEDULE_DETAIL b WHERE a.SCHEDULE_NO = b.SCHEDULE_NO AND a.REG_ID = #{UserAccount.user_id}

SELECT a.SCHEDULE_NO,b.USER_ID,FN_DECRYPT(b.ENCPT_USER_NM) AS USER_NM, CASE WHEN FN_DECRYPT(b.ENCPT_SEXDSTN_SE) = 'M' THEN '남' ELSE '여' END AS USER_SEX, (SELECT CD_NM FROM COM_CD_MNG WHERE UP_CD_NO = '32' AND CD = b.RGN_CD) AS AREA_NM, b.INSTR_INST_ND_ENTRPS_NM AS INSTRUCTOR_COPER_NM FROM EDU_SCHEDULE_DETAIL a, COM_USER b WHERE a.SCHEDULE_NO = #{sch_no} AND b.USER_ID IN (SELECT INS_USER FROM EDU_SCHEDULE_APP WHERE SCHEDULE_NO = #{sch_no})
mapper.update: UPDATE EDU_SCHEDULE_DETAIL SET CANCEL_DATE = DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%x-%m-%d'), CANCEL_REASON = #{cancel_reason}, CANCEL_USER = #{cancel_user}, CANCEL_TEL = #{cancel_tel}, CANCEL_REMARK = #{cancel_remark}, SCH_STATUS = 'C' WHERE SCHEDULE_NO = #{schedule_no}
mapper.select: SELECT a.SCHEDULE_NO, a.EDU_ORG_NAME, b.COPER_ADDR, b.USER_NM, b.USER_TELNO, b.USER_EML, a.EDU_TEAC_NAME, a.EDU_START_DATE, a.EDU_NAME, a.EDU_TARGET, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM EDU_COURSE_REGISTRATION WHERE EDU_NO = a.EDU_KEY) AS EDU_NUMBER2, a.EDU_NUMBER, b.EDU_PLACE, a.EDU_KEY FROM EDU_SCHEDULE a, EDU_SCHEDULE_DETAIL b WHERE a.SCHEDULE_NO = b.SCHEDULE_NO AND a.SCHEDULE_NO = ${sch_no}

SELECT b.USER_ID, FN_DECRYPT(b.ENCPT_USER_NM) AS USER_NM, CASE WHEN FN_DECRYPT(b.ENCPT_SEXDSTN_SE) = 'M' THEN '남자' ELSE '여자' END AS USER_SEX, FN_GET_CD_NM1('238', b.JOB_CD) JOB_CD, DATE_FORMAT(b.BRDT,'%Y-%m-%d') AS BIRTH_YMD, b.EML_ADDR, FN_DECRYPT(b.ENCPT_MBL_TELNO) AS MBL_TELNO, CONCAT(FN_DECRYPT(b.ENCPT_DADDR) ,' ', FN_DECRYPT(b.ENCPT_ADDR)) AS JUSO, CASE WHEN a.COUR_STAT = '1' THEN '참석' ELSE '미참석' END AS COUR_STAT FROM EDU_COURSE_REGISTRATION a, COM_USER b WHERE a.USER_ID = b.USER_ID AND a.USE_YN IS NULL AND a.EDU_NO = (SELECT EDU_KEY FROM EDU_SCHEDULE WHERE SCHEDULE_NO = ${sch_no})

SELECT COUNT(tb.SCH_STATUS) AS ALL_CNT ,COUNT(CASE tb.SCH_STATUS WHEN '0' THEN 1 END) AS CNT0 ,COUNT(CASE tb.SCH_STATUS WHEN '1' THEN 1 END) AS CNT1 ,COUNT(CASE tb.SCH_STATUS WHEN '2' THEN 1 END) AS CNT2 ,COUNT(CASE tb.SCH_STATUS WHEN '3' THEN 1 END) AS CNT3 ,COUNT(CASE tb.SCH_STATUS WHEN '4' THEN 1 END) AS CNT4 FROM( SELECT a.SCHEDULE_NO, a.EDU_NAME, a.EDU_START_DATE AS EDU_DATE, (SELECT EDU_TIME FROM EDU_REGISTRATION WHERE EDU_NO = a.EDU_KEY) AS EDU_TIME, (SELECT CD_NM FROM COM_CD_MNG WHERE UP_CD_NO = '32' AND CD = b.COPER_AREA_CD) AS AREA_NM, a.EDU_ORG_NAME, (SELECT FN_DECRYPT(ENCPT_USER_NM) FROM COM_USER WHERE USER_ID = a.REG_ID) AS USER_NM, a.EDU_TARGET, b.EDU_PLACE, a.EDU_NUMBER, a.EDU_TEAC_NAME, a.EDU_TEAC_ID, b.CANCEL_REASON, CASE WHEN b.INS_TYPE = 'recruit' AND INS_STATUS IS NULL THEN '섭외중' WHEN b.INS_TYPE = 'recruit' AND INS_STATUS IS NOT NULL THEN '완료' WHEN b.INS_TYPE = 'select' AND INS_STATUS IS NULL THEN '완료' WHEN b.INS_TYPE = 'input' AND INS_STATUS IS NULL THEN '완료' END AS INS_STATUS,
CASE WHEN b.INS_TYPE = 'recruit' AND INS_STATUS IS NULL AND b.SCH_STATUS IS NULL AND a.EDU_START_DATE > DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%x-%m-%d') THEN '0' WHEN b.INS_TYPE = 'recruit' AND INS_STATUS IS NOT NULL AND b.SCH_STATUS IS NULL AND a.EDU_START_DATE > DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%x-%m-%d') THEN '1' WHEN b.INS_TYPE = 'select' AND INS_STATUS IS NULL AND b.SCH_STATUS IS NULL AND a.EDU_START_DATE > DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%x-%m-%d') THEN '1' WHEN b.INS_TYPE = 'input' AND INS_STATUS IS NULL AND b.SCH_STATUS IS NULL AND a.EDU_START_DATE > DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%x-%m-%d') THEN '1' WHEN b.SCH_STATUS = 'C' THEN '2' WHEN b.SCH_STATUS IS NULL AND a.EDU_START_DATE <= NOW() THEN '3' WHEN b.SCH_STATUS = 'S' THEN '4' END AS SCH_STATUS
FROM EDU_SCHEDULE a, EDU_SCHEDULE_DETAIL b WHERE a.SCHEDULE_NO = b.SCHEDULE_NO ) tb WHERE 1=1
AND tb.EDU_ORG_NAME LIKE CONCAT('%',#{org_nm},'%')
AND tb.EDU_TEAC_NAME LIKE CONCAT('%',#{ins_nm},'%')
AND tb.EDU_NAME LIKE CONCAT('%',#{edu_nm},'%')
AND tb.SCH_STATUS = '1'
AND tb.SCH_STATUS = '2'
AND tb.SCH_STATUS = '3'
AND tb.SCH_STATUS = '4'
AND tb.EDU_DATE = DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%x-%m-%d')
AND tb.EDU_DATE >= #{start_date} AND tb.EDU_DATE <= #{end_date}

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT a.SCHEDULE_NO, a.EDU_NAME, a.EDU_START_DATE AS EDU_DATE, (SELECT EDU_TIME FROM EDU_REGISTRATION WHERE EDU_NO = a.EDU_KEY) AS EDU_TIME, (SELECT CD_NM FROM COM_CD_MNG WHERE UP_CD_NO = '32' AND CD = b.COPER_AREA_CD) AS AREA_NM, a.EDU_ORG_NAME, (SELECT FN_DECRYPT(ENCPT_USER_NM) FROM COM_USER WHERE USER_ID = a.REG_ID) AS USER_NM, a.EDU_TARGET, b.EDU_PLACE, a.EDU_NUMBER, a.EDU_TEAC_NAME, a.EDU_TEAC_ID, b.CANCEL_REASON, CASE WHEN b.INS_TYPE = 'recruit' AND INS_STATUS IS NULL THEN '섭외중' WHEN b.INS_TYPE = 'recruit' AND INS_STATUS IS NOT NULL THEN '완료' WHEN b.INS_TYPE = 'select' AND INS_STATUS IS NULL THEN '완료' WHEN b.INS_TYPE = 'input' AND INS_STATUS IS NULL THEN '완료' END AS INS_STATUS,
CASE WHEN b.INS_TYPE = 'recruit' AND INS_STATUS IS NULL AND b.SCH_STATUS IS NULL AND a.EDU_START_DATE > DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%x-%m-%d') THEN '' WHEN b.INS_TYPE = 'recruit' AND INS_STATUS IS NOT NULL AND b.SCH_STATUS IS NULL AND a.EDU_START_DATE > DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%x-%m-%d') THEN '신청완료' WHEN b.INS_TYPE = 'select' AND INS_STATUS IS NULL AND b.SCH_STATUS IS NULL AND a.EDU_START_DATE > DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%x-%m-%d') THEN '신청완료' WHEN b.INS_TYPE = 'input' AND INS_STATUS IS NULL AND b.SCH_STATUS IS NULL AND a.EDU_START_DATE > DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%x-%m-%d') THEN '신청완료' WHEN b.SCH_STATUS = 'C' THEN '신청취소' WHEN b.SCH_STATUS IS NULL AND a.EDU_START_DATE <= NOW() THEN '교육완료' WHEN b.SCH_STATUS = 'S' THEN '보고완료' END AS SCH_STATUS
FROM EDU_SCHEDULE a, EDU_SCHEDULE_DETAIL b WHERE a.SCHEDULE_NO = b.SCHEDULE_NO ) tb WHERE 1=1
AND tb.EDU_ORG_NAME LIKE CONCAT('%',#{org_nm},'%')
AND tb.EDU_TEAC_NAME LIKE CONCAT('%',#{ins_nm},'%')
AND tb.EDU_NAME LIKE CONCAT('%',#{edu_nm},'%')
AND tb.SCH_STATUS = '신청완료'
AND tb.SCH_STATUS = '신청취소'
AND tb.SCH_STATUS = '교육완료'
AND tb.SCH_STATUS = '보고완료'
AND tb.EDU_DATE = DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%x-%m-%d')
AND tb.EDU_DATE >= #{start_date} AND tb.EDU_DATE <= #{end_date}
ORDER BY tb.SCHEDULE_NO DESC LIMIT #{recordCountPerPage} OFFSET #{offset}

AND tb.EDU_DATE = DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%x-%m-%d')
AND tb.EDU_DATE >= #{start_date} AND tb.EDU_DATE <= #{end_date}

SELECT a.EDU_KEY, b.COPER_AREA_CD, a.EDU_ORG_NAME, b.COPER_ADDR, b.USER_NM, b.USER_TELNO, b.USER_EML, a.EDU_TEAC_NAME, a.EDU_TEAC_ID, b.INS_TYPE, a.EDU_NAME, a.EDU_TARGET, a.EDU_START_DATE, b.START_TIME, b.END_TIME, a.EDU_NUMBER, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM EDU_COURSE_REGISTRATION WHERE SCHEDULE_NO = a.SCHEDULE_NO) AS APP_COUNT, b.EDU_PLACE, b.CANCEL_DATE, b.CANCEL_REASON, b.CANCEL_USER, b.CANCEL_TEL, b.CANCEL_REMARK FROM EDU_SCHEDULE a, EDU_SCHEDULE_DETAIL b WHERE a.SCHEDULE_NO = b.SCHEDULE_NO AND a.SCHEDULE_NO = #{sch_no}

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM EDU_SCHEDULE a, EDU_SCHEDULE_DETAIL b
WHERE 1=1 AND a.SCHEDULE_NO = b.SCHEDULE_NO AND a.CATEGORY1_KEY = '7'

SELECT COUNT(*) AS ALL_CNT ,COUNT(CASE WHEN b.SCH_STATUS IS NULL THEN 1 END) AS CNT0 ,COUNT(CASE WHEN b.SCH_STATUS = 'S' THEN 1 END) AS CNT1 FROM EDU_SCHEDULE a, EDU_SCHEDULE_DETAIL b WHERE 1=1 AND a.SCHEDULE_NO = b.SCHEDULE_NO AND a.CATEGORY1_KEY = '7'
